channel.title: Moderation
channel.description:
i noticed that super_ is muted
he was muted for a post he made whilst moderated
what fucking halfwit moderator accepted the posts in the first place? are you guys actually retarded?

item.title: Moderation
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Mr.Chris:

Be civil to you, Adam. Maybe if you acted up to your age, there would be no reason to be uncivil with you.

Do you even know my age Mr. Chris? It’s irrelevant to speak of my age if you honestly don’t know what you’re talking about.

Defence aside: I do agree with frank_'s original post that something needs to be done/looked at. His example is pretty clear.

Read full topic

item.description:

obsessed with the moderation? I think not. I’m one of the most uncaring, inactive people that are on the forum.

Be civil to you, Adam. Maybe if you acted up to your age, there would be no reason to be uncivil with you.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderation
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Adam, post:63, topic:307641”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=403789.msg3024130#msg3024130 date=1257792238]
Otherwise threads like this happen, and all the people who have some sort of obsessive problem with the moderation just flock to it, dominate it, and turn it in to a witch hunt…
[/quote]
On the contrary, individuals who are so obsessed with certain moderators will defend them with no initial knowledge of what has happened to the “whiney little bitches.”[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Moderation
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Mr.Chris:

Otherwise threads like this happen, and all the people who have some sort of obsessive problem with the moderation just flock to it, dominate it, and turn it in to a witch hunt…

On the contrary, individuals who are so obsessed with certain moderators will defend them with no initial knowledge of what has happened to the “whiney little bitches.”

Mr.Chris:

Adam, you’re being a selfish whiney little bitch. Grow up and maybe if you didn’t post such ignorant bullshit trying to start some sort of argument, there would be no problem.

It usually helps to be civil yourself, in-order to tell someone to grow up.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderation
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Wow, this topic is fucking stupid. Adam, you’re being a selfish whiney little bitch. Grow up and maybe if you didn’t post such ignorant bullshit trying to start some sort of argument, there would be no problem. As far as I can tell, Tico’s just strict with the rules, and maybe thats a good thing. Several months ago there were people whining about how moderation was elite and that people just weren’t being dealt with properly. Now that Tico has come along (and for some reason people are just refusing to accept it) and actually started warning and banning those little childish shit heads, people clutch at straws 'cause they dislike him…

From what I can see, moderation seems to be fine (maybe with a couple of exceptions), and people just need to chillax and let them deal with it. Otherwise threads like this happen, and all the people who have some sort of obsessive problem with the moderation just flock to it, dominate it, and turn it in to a witch hunt…

Read full topic

item.title: Moderation
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Tico:

You were banned for unnecessary remarks. Defending yourself does not involve “flaming” or anything of the sort.

Mind telling me how voicing my opinion is related to flaming? I saw unjust rule and pointed out that a person barely old enough to play RuneScape (without breaking Jagex’s rules) should not be given moderation powers. Your unjust rule is in direct correspondence with your maturity level.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderation
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Adam, post:56, topic:307641”][quote author=Tico link=topic=403789.msg3016442#msg3016442 date=1257219043]
Secondly, may I remind you that as a member of staff I reserve the right to interpret any rule in any way I see fit. So unless I have literally abused, your argument is considered invalid.
[/quote]
So what’s the point of having any rules at all if they’re just able to be bent/twisted as already pointed out by five people? Tico, you’re interpretation of anything is that you’re always in the right. I think it’s about time that you realize that your moderation powers don’t always make you right.

You banned me for defending myself against you. Does this mean that you can just troll around and hold a one sided debate? Because low and behold, the moment someone defends themself against you, they’ll be banned.[/quote]

You were banned for unnecessary remarks. Defending yourself does not involve “flaming” or anything of the sort.

Read full topic

[/quote]
Because low and behold, the moment someone defends themself against you, they’ll be banned.[/quote]is this a novel

item.title: Moderation
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Tico:

Secondly, may I remind you that as a member of staff I reserve the right to interpret any rule in any way I see fit. So unless I have literally abused, your argument is considered invalid.

So what’s the point of having any rules at all if they’re just able to be bent/twisted as already pointed out by five people? Tico, you’re interpretation of anything is that you’re always in the right. I think it’s about time that you realize that your moderation powers don’t always make you right.

You banned me for defending myself against you. Does this mean that you can just troll around and hold a one sided debate? Because low and behold, the moment someone defends themself against you, they’ll be banned.

Read full topic
